name: Product Demo Marketing Template
description: Professional product demonstration template focused on benefits and social proof
template: Struggling with {pain_point}? I was too, until I discovered {product_name}. Watch this: {demonstration_action}. See how {key_benefit}? But here's the best part - {unique_selling_point}. I've been using this for {usage_duration} and {personal_result}. {social_proof}. If you want to {desired_outcome}, check the link in my bio. Use code {discount_code} for {discount_amount} off!

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: Name of the product being demonstrated

variables.name: demonstration_action
variables.description: What action demonstrates the product's effectiveness

variables.name: key_benefit
variables.description: Main benefit visible in the demonstration

variables.name: unique_selling_point
variables.description: What makes this product special or different

variables.name: usage_duration
variables.description: How long the speaker has been using the product

variables.name: personal_result
variables.description: Personal outcome or result from using the product

variables.name: social_proof
variables.description: Testimonial, review, or social proof element
variables.defaultValue: Thousands of customers love it too

variables.name: desired_outcome
variables.description: What the customer wants to achieve
